articles.title: Google officially launching Gboard for its WearOS - ANI News
articles.description: Washington [US], May 8 (ANI): American technology conglomerate Google recently confirmed that Gboard for its Wear OS has officially launched and will be way better than the default WearOS keyboard.

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Brazil eyes new Pfizer deal next week for 100 million more COVID-19 shots - CNA
articles.description: Brazil expects to sign a new deal next week with Pfizer Inc for 100 million more COVID-19 vaccine doses, a Health Ministry official said on Friday, which would double the U.S. drugmaker's delivery to the Latin American country this year.
